title: Ivanti security advisory (AV25-661)
description: Between October 13 and 14, 2025, Ivanti published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Ivanti Endpoint Manager  version 2024 SU3 SR1 and prior
Ivanti Endpoint Manager  version 2022 SU8 SR2 and prior
Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile  versions 12.6.0.1, 12.5.0.2 and 12.4.0.3
Ivanti Neurons for MDM  version R118 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
